title: Idea that might both fix the Ranged top issue and make the game more interesting
body: What if we had more starting items for non-supports and non-junglers? Instead of having just Doran's shield, blade, and ring, and the corrupting potion as starting items, what if we had more diverse items? For example, there would be a Doran's type item for melee damage, melee tank stats, ranged damage, ranged tank stats, a defensive mage item, and an offensive mage item? This would not only make the first items often actually dynamic, but it might make certain classes easier to damage. For example, marksmen would be able to be nerfed without nerfing assassins.

replies.body: It's not like you have to buy a Doran's item, you know. You can start longsword, cloth armor, amp tome, boots even, etc.

I'm interested. However look at {{item:1083}} {{item:1082}} aren't that good. I'm sure if they add more starting items we would see a few rise to the top and never know the others existed.
